title: Ask Sean Anything Mailbag: ‘Avatar 2,’ 10 Exciting Under-40 Directors, and ‘Everything Everywhere All at Once’ at the Oscars
description:
Let’s dig into the mailbag! Sean answers your questions about the year in movies so far, film book recommendations, what a producer actually does, and a lot more.

Host: Sean Fennessey
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
